sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Council on Women and Girls Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Council on Women and Girls Act.

sections.heading: Findings and declaration of policy. The General Assembly hereby finds, determines, and declares the following:
sections.text: Findings and declaration of policy. The General Assembly hereby finds, determines, and declares the following:

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: The Illinois Council on Women and Girls.
sections.text: The Illinois Council on Women and Girls.

sections.heading: Meetings. The Council shall meet at least once per quarter
sections.text: In addition, the Council may hold up to 2 public hearings annually to assist in the development of policy recommendations to the Governor and the General Assembly, and implement programming to meet its overall mission goals. All meetings of

sections.heading: Reports. The Council shall electronically issue semi-annual
sections.text:
reports on its policy recommendations by June 30th and December
31st of each year to the Governor and the General Assembly. The reports issued to the General Assembly under this Section shall be filed electronically with the General Assembly as provided under Section 3.1 of the General Assembly Organization Act, and shall be provided to any member of the General Assembly upon request.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
